item.title: Vulnerability in User Role Editor - Users Can Become Admins - Wordfence
item.description:
Vulnerability in User Role Editor - Users Can Become Admins - Wordfence

There is a major vulnerability in a popular plugin with over 300,000 active installs: User Role Editor 4.24 and older. The vulnerability allows any registered user to gain administrator access. For sites that have open registration, this is a serious security hole. If you are running User Role Editor, upgrade to the newest version which is 4.25 ...

item.title: Beware Internet Users! Faster Internet Adware Could Harm Your System!
item.description:
Beware Internet Users! Faster Internet Adware Could Harm Your System!

A new Adware has been discovered by security researchers of famous security company Bleeping Computer. The name of this new Adware is "Faster Internet". According to security researchers, this faster Internet Adware is capable to taking screenshots of registry files and all ongoing process of an infected system.
